verses.verse: And Mosheh <WH4872> spake <WH1696> <WH8762> unto the heads <WH7218> of the tribes <WH4294> concerning the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, This is the thing <WH1697> which the YY <WH3068> hath commanded <WH6680> <WH8765>.

If a man <WH376> vow <WH5087> <WH8799> a vow <WH5088> unto the YY <WH3068>, or swear <WH7650> <WH8736> an oath <WH7621> to bind <WH631> <WH8800> his soul <WH5315> with a bond <WH632>; he shall not break <WH2490> <WH8686> his word <WH1697>, he shall do <WH6213> <WH8799> according to all that proceedeth <WH3318> <WH8802> out of his mouth <WH6310>.

If a woman <WH802> also vow <WH5087> <WH8799> a vow <WH5088> unto the YY <WH3068>, and bind <WH631> <WH8804> herself by a bond <WH632>, being in her father's <WH1> house <WH1004> in her youth <WH5271>;

And her father <WH1> hear <WH8085> <WH8804> her vow <WH5088>, and her bond <WH632> wherewith she hath bound <WH631> <WH8804> her soul <WH5315>, and her father <WH1> shall hold his peace <WH2790> <WH8689> at her: then all her vows <WH5088> shall stand <WH6965> <WH8804>, and every bond <WH632> wherewith she hath bound <WH631> <WH8804> her soul <WH5315> shall stand <WH6965> <WH8799>.

But if her father <WH1> disallow <WH5106> <WH8689> her in the day <WH3117> that he heareth <WH8085> <WH8800>; not any of her vows <WH5088>, or of her bonds <WH632> wherewith she hath bound <WH631> <WH8804> her soul <WH5315>, shall stand <WH6965> <WH8799>: and the YY <WH3068> shall forgive <WH5545> <WH8799> her, because her father <WH1> disallowed <WH5106> <WH8689> her.
And if she had at all an husband <WH376>, when she vowed <WH5088>, or uttered <WH4008> ought out of her lips <WH8193>, wherewith she bound <WH631> <WH8804> her soul <WH5315>;

And her husband <WH376> heard <WH8085> <WH8804> it, and held his peace <WH2790> <WH8689> at her in the day <WH3117> that he heard <WH8085> <WH8800> it: then her vows <WH5088> shall stand <WH6965> <WH8804>, and her bonds <WH632> wherewith she bound <WH631> <WH8804> her soul <WH5315> shall stand <WH6965> <WH8799>.

But if her husband <WH376> disallowed <WH5106> <WH8686> her on the day <WH3117> that he heard <WH8085> <WH8800> it; then he shall make her vow which she vowed <WH5088>, and that which she uttered <WH4008> with her lips <WH8193>, wherewith she bound <WH631> <WH8804> her soul <WH5315>, of none effect <WH6565> <WH8689>: and the YY <WH3068> shall forgive <WH5545> <WH8799> her.
But every vow <WH5088> of a widow <WH490>, and of her that is divorced <WH1644> <WH8803>, wherewith they have bound <WH631> <WH8804> their souls <WH5315>, shall stand <WH6965> <WH8799> against her.
And if she vowed <WH5087> <WH8804> in her husband's <WH376> house <WH1004>, or bound <WH631> <WH8804> her soul <WH5315> by a bond <WH632> with an oath <WH7621>;

And her husband <WH376> heard <WH8085> <WH8804> it, and held his peace <WH2790> <WH8689> at her, and disallowed <WH5106> <WH8689> her not: then all her vows <WH5088> shall stand <WH6965> <WH8799>, and every bond <WH632> wherewith she bound <WH631> <WH8804> her soul <WH5315> shall stand <WH6965> <WH8804>.

But if her husband <WH376> hath utterly <WH6565> <WH8687> made them void <WH6565> <WH8686> on the day <WH3117> he heard <WH8085> <WH8800> them; then whatsoever proceeded <WH4161> out of her lips <WH8193> concerning her vows <WH5088>, or concerning the bond <WH632> of her soul <WH5315>, shall not stand <WH6965> <WH8799>: her husband <WH376> hath made them void <WH6565> <WH8689>; and the YY <WH3068> shall forgive <WH5545> <WH8799> her.

Havahry vow <WH5088>, and every binding <WH632> oath <WH7621> to afflict <WH6031> <WH8763> the soul <WH5315>, her husband <WH376> may establish <WH6965> <WH8686> it, or her husband <WH376> may make it void <WH6565> <WH8686>.

But if her husband <WH376> altogether <WH2790> <WH8687> hold his peace <WH2790> <WH8686> at her from day <WH3117> to day <WH3117>; then he establisheth <WH6965> <WH8689> all her vows <WH5088>, or all her bonds <WH632>, which are upon her: he confirmeth <WH6965> <WH8689> them, because he held his peace <WH2790> <WH8689> at her in the day <WH3117> that he heard <WH8085> <WH8800> them.
But if he shall any ways <WH6565> <WH8687> make them void <WH6565> <WH8686> after <WH310> that he hath heard <WH8085> <WH8800> them; then he shall bear <WH5375> <WH8804> her iniquity <WH5771>.

These are the statutes <WH2706>, which the YY <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> Mosheh <WH4872>, between a man <WH376> and his wife <WH802>, between the father <WH1> and his daughter <WH1323>, being yet in her youth <WH5271> in her father's <WH1> house <WH1004>.
